tooltips.alert_engine: Real-time monitoring for suspicious transactions and patterns with ML algorithms
tooltips.alert_overview: Overview of all active security alerts and their severity (Critical/High/Medium/Low)
tooltips.analyst_throughput: Number of cases closed per analyst within the selected window
tooltips.backlog: Total count of open (unacknowledged) alerts and open cases
tooltips.database: PostgreSQL/TimescaleDB connection status and response time for time-series data
tooltips.graph_db: Neo4j graph database for complex relationship analysis and network mapping
tooltips.system_status: Shows current status of all system components. Green = Healthy, Red = Issues detected
tooltips.false_positive_rate: Percentage of false alerts out of all alerts
tooltips.mttr: Average time to response/resolution (Mean Time To Response/Resolution)
tooltips.sla_breach_rate: Percentage of cases/alerts exceeding the defined SLA
tooltips.sanctions_hits: Number of hits against sanctions lists (OFAC/UN/EU/UK)
tooltips.trend_analysis: Visualization of traces, alerts, and risk distribution over time
tooltips.trend_analysis_admin: System-wide visualization of all traces, alerts, and risk distribution (Admin view)
tooltips.live_alerts: Real-time stream of the latest security warnings via WebSocket

hero.title: Crypto Risk Management for Banks
hero.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Blockchain Forensics for Financial Institutions. Real-Time Transaction Monitoring, KYC/AML Compliance, Travel Rule Implementation. FATF-compliant and Bank-Grade Security.

customer_onboarding.description: Expand your banking for crypto-affine customers. Fully automated KYC/AML for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Stablecoins.

regulatory_compliance.description: Meet all regulatory requirements: Travel Rule, Sanctions Screening, MiCA-compliant.

transaction_monitoring.description: Monitor your customers crypto transactions in real-time. Automatic flagging for High-Risk Activities.

fraud_prevention.description: Protect your customers from crypto scams, phishing, ransomware. Proactive warnings for suspicious transfers.

cross_border_payments.description: Verify receiving VASPs for cross-border crypto payments. Travel Rule Messages automatically.

audit_reporting.description: Automatically generate compliance reports for BaFin, ECB, EBA. Complete audit trails.

customer_onboarding.description: Customer wants to use crypto banking services

wallet_verification.description: Customers crypto wallets are analyzed: Source of Funds, Risk Score, Sanctions

ongoing_monitoring.description: Continuous monitoring of all customer crypto transactions

risk_assessment.description: For suspicious transactions: Automatic Risk Scoring & Alerting

compliance_reporting.description: Automatic SAR generation for Suspicious Activity, regular compliance reports

bank_grade_security.title: Bank-Grade Security
bank_grade_security.description: ISO 27001, SOC 2 Type II, GDPR-compliant. Multi-factor Authentication, Role-based Access Control.

uptime_sla.title: 99.9% Uptime SLA
uptime_sla.description: Enterprise SLA with guaranteed availability. 24/7 Support, Disaster Recovery, Redundant Infrastructure.

white_label.title: White-Label Solution
white_label.description: Fully branded solution for your bank. Custom Domain, Logo, Colors. API-First Architecture.

on_premise.title: On-Premise Deployment
on_premise.description: Hosted in your own infrastructure. Full data control. Dedicated Support.

multi_entity.title: Multi-Entity Support
multi_entity.description: Manage multiple banking entities in one platform. Consolidated Reporting, Shared Intelligence.

custom_integration.title: Custom Integration
custom_integration.description: Integration with your Core Banking System. REST API, Webhooks, CSV Import/Export.
